name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Session Paw: SideWise OneTab Tabs Outliner

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tree Style Tabs Outliner & Quick Jump to Recent Tabs & Group Tab and Windows & Tab Session Manager.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Lovely and Powerful, a cute browser extension to help you tame 10,000 tabs 🐈🐾🐾🐾
  🐾  Privacy First
  🐾  Cloud Sessions
  🐾  SideWise Tabs List
  🐾  Dual-Screen Session Manager ( salute to the old Session Buddy)
  🐾  Tabs from other devices with better split-algriothm and easy-to-use view
  🐾  Sync selected windows across devices
  🐾  Recent Tabs Marker
  🐾  Big Picture to manage or preivew hundreds of tabs at a glance


***

Privacy First!

  - Across devices with no backend-servers, all your data saved locally or on your browser account.
  - `Tabs from other devices` are provided by browser directly, SessionPaw just makes a better UI/UX to use it.
  - `Cloud Sessions` and `Sync selected windows` are implemented as storing data in browser's bookmarks.
  - No tracking and No ads. SessionPaw would never access network except checking your Premium Account status.

***

Many Super-Views give you a big picture of everything.

- Tree-Styled Tabs Manager.
- All in One Big-Picture View.
- Preview via huge screenshots quickly.
...
- and lots of features wait you to discover!

***

Recent Tabs Marker & Intuitive Handy Tools!

- Drag-and-drop almost everywhere.
- Hover to get lots of quick tools, like bookmark, tab-splitter.
- Powerful context menu to do macro-ops, like restoring last closed tabs or saving all.

***

Devices View & Session Manager

- Smart splitting to avoid mess.
- Dual-panel session manager and drag-and-drop to organzie sessions like a Pro!

***

🎉 Check [https://sessionpaw.com] for more features and freeApps 🎉
🎉 Join our discord [https://discord.com/invite/jWRsTZDqg7] to give us your blue-sky thinking 🎉
